question: Khilafat movement stressed on which of the following factors?
option1: Restoration of Turkish Caliph as the head of Indian Muslims
option2: Reservation of seats for Muslim community in Government services
answer: Restoration of Turkish Caliph as the head of Indian Muslims
explanation: The Khilafat movement was an agitation by Indian Muslims allied with Indian nationalism in the years following World War I. Its purpose was to pressure the British government to preserve the authority of the Ottoman Sultan as Caliph of Islam following the breakup of the Ottoman Empire at the end of the war.
